TypeSignature.Value: public class DisposerTaskClosure<TDisposable> : System.Threading.Tasks.DisposerTaskClosure<System.Threading.Tasks.AsyncVoid,TDisposable> where TDisposable : class, IDisposable

.class public auto ansi DisposerTaskClosure`1<class (class System.IDisposable) TDisposable> extends System.Threading.Tasks.DisposerTaskClosure`2<valuetype System.Threading.Tasks.AsyncVoid, !TDisposable>

Docs.typeparam: The type of disposable resource that should be managed by the closure.
Docs.summary: A base class for closures used to implement asynchronous methods that also disposes a resource when the asynchronous activity is done/fails.
Docs.remarks: This class is based on TaskClosure and overrides its Final method to dispose the passed in resource.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(!TDisposable res) cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a new DisposerTaskClosure around the given resource.
Docs.remarks: This constructor is protected i.e. you must inherit this class to use its features.

Docs.remarks: This method also handles cleanup of resources.
